ygData.subject: Re: Death of a tyrant

::KitKat::

She took the head and looked at it.  She smiled.  Looking up at 
Starscream, "Yeah, your friend can do that. But hold on a second. 
Something isn't right here.  I killed the mighty Megatron with a 
single grenade. It was way to easy to defeat him.  Megatron isn't 
stupid. He is very, very smart.  I don't trust him. I'm looking at 
his head and yet.  Something..." She looked at the head and 
frowned. "Starscream...you knew him best. Tell me, when you knew of 
his cloning capabilities, is it possable he had the time too...or 
could he have cloned himself?"  She looked at the head and then 
handed it back to Starscream. "No, maybe not.  Maybe I'm just being 
paranoid." SHe sighed and then turned to the others. "Let's go and 
find ourselves a base. Now that Megatron is out of the way, let's go 
and find our new home.  We will need a base of operations if we are 
to tackle our next targets, the maximals." She walked off, still 
thinking about the battle.  Her side was now in great pain.  She 
winced and groaned slightly. "OK, let's go.  I care not to see this 
place any longer."  She slowly walked off.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream/Gotron
> 
> Starscream carefully lowered himself to the ground, battered and 
> bruised from the damage Inferno and his clones had produced. He 
> watched the destruction of Megatron, and cried out in joy as it 
> happened. Now their group could be free of his tyrany, and they 
could 
> blossom as a real power under KitKat. But than he began thinking. 
He 
> knew the original Megatron better than anyone. After all, he was 
the 
> one who had ended his life the first time. And according to 
stories, 
> this Megatron was supposed to be even more crafty than the 
original. 
> It said that he was sentenced to death for his treachery on the 
Beast 
> Wars. How he escaped Maximal prisons was beyond him.(I would really 
> like to know that, I wasn't here when that happened and it would be 
> interesting to see.) Megatron wouldn't put himself in that much 
> danger, and allow himself to be destroyed so easily. But, he 
couldn't 
> be a clone because his pigmentation was te right color. So what 
went 
> through Megatron's head as he was so risky. Starscream went to bot 
> mode and walked over to the fallen head of Megatron. It's face had 
> gone blank, and was burned around the edges. He gazed at it, trying 
> to find something that would indicate that this is not Megatron.
(The 
> eyes went out so I can't say that.) Nothing. He looked at KitKat, 
> giving the head to her.
> 
> "Here, keep this as a token of our liberation today. But what I was 
> thinking is that we could run some tests on it. We may have 
defeated 
> Megatron, but our war with them is far from over. Maybe he's got 
some 
> back-up files that are still useful about his plans in his head. 
> Inferno won't forget this, and Black Arachnia will gladly take 
> command again and try to defeat us. We need to know everything 
about 
> them that we can."
> 
> Meanwhile, Gotron stopped dead in his tracks as he was running back 
> to the Alliance base. He had done this mission, but was he really 
> needed at the Alliance? He never really got the glamour missions he 
> was hoping for. But he didn't want to give up the Alliance. He 
always 
> wanted to join his friend Starscream. He needed an idea. He sent a 
> comm to Wheeljack who was far ahead.
> 
> "I won't be re-joining you at the Alliance base. Tell Zardus that I 
> am going to act as a transmitter of messages, sort of like an 
> ambassador to the new Pred group. When we get information on the 
war 
> against Megatron, I will contact him."
> 
> Gotron opened a comm to his friend Starscream
> 
> "Starscream? It's Gotron. You there?"
> 
> "Yeah, buddy. We just killed Megatron! We're free! Ain't that 
great?"
> 
> "Cool. Listen, The Alliance wants to keep close ties with this new 
> Pred group. We were all wondering if I could come stay with you 
guys 
> for a bit and relay stuff to Zardus. Is that okay?"
> 
> "Hold on. Let me ask KitKat."
> 
> He turned to her.
> 
> "Is it okay if my friend Gotron comes and acts as an ambassador of 
> the Alliance? The group I brought aren't really Alliance. They are 
> just on peace terms with them."
